net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.renderer

Class ConditionalCommentRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.renderer.ConditionalCommentRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConditionalCommentCallbackHandler

    public class ConditionalCommentRenderer
extends Object
implements ConditionalCommentCallbackHandler
    Renderer for internet explorer conditional comments. Wraps script or stylesheet tags with conditional comments for IE specific contents.
    Author:
    Jordi Hernández Sellés, ibrahim Chaehoi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConditionalCommentRenderer(Writer out)
      Create a renderer that writes conditional comments to the specified writer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeConditionalComment()
      This method will be invoked to signal the need to close a conditional comment previously opened.
      void openConditionalComment(String expression)
      This method will be invoked to signal the need to start a conditional comment, which will use the specified expression.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
